title: Exercise: Let the User Choose the Output Format

questions.question: You've set the Generic Writer output feature type Geometry to "fme_any". When writing out to an Esri Shapefile, the writer will:
options: Fail if the output features are of more than one geometry type.
Create a single output shapefile with geometry set to the first output feature, and then ignore any features with a different geometry type.
Create a separate shapefile for each type of geometry encountered, and append the geometry name to the shapefile name.
Create shapefiles named for each geometry supported by FME, even if those shapefiles end up being empty because there were no features with that geometry.

questions.question: When adding a new reader to the Canvas, using the "Single Merged Feature Type" option will add a single feature type to the Canvas, with the Merge Feature Type turned on, and "Merge Filter" set to *.
